subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The answers are filtering in on how would Steve Nash and Amar’e Stoudemire, one of the league’s top tandems in Phoenix, are faring since Stoudemire left for the Knicks.
snippet: The answers are filtering in on how would Steve Nash and Amar’e Stoudemire, one of the league’s top tandems in Phoenix, are faring since Stoudemire left for the Knicks.
